---
name: "az-cli-troubleshooting"
description: "Guidance for collecting Azure CLI context and reproducible troubleshooting steps."
applyTo: "**/*.sh,**/*.ps1,**/*.psm1,**/*.md"
---

# AZ CLI Troubleshooting

- Use `az account show` and `az group show` to validate context.
- Capture and include `--debug` logs when escalating to platform team.
- Provide reproducible commands and expected vs actual outputs.
# AZ CLI Troubleshooting

- Use `az account show` and `az group show` to validate context.
- Capture and include `--debug` logs when escalating to platform team.
- Provide reproducible commands and expected vs actual outputs.
